function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of physical activity due to pandemic restrictions leading to physical and mental health issues","Impact":"Increased risk of physical and mental health problems","Mitigation":"Promote alternative safe physical activities, provide mental health support resources","Technologies":"Virtual fitness classes, mental health apps","People":"General public, especially those impacted by restrictions","Owner":"Health organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Limited awareness of the importance of physical activity during a pandemic","Impact":"Reduced engagement in physical activity and increased susceptibility to health issues","Mitigation":"Public health campaigns, education programs on safe physical activities","Technologies":"Social media, online educational platforms","People":"General public, especially those less informed about the benefits of physical activity","Owner":"Public health authorities, fitness organizations"},{"Description":"Vulnerability of specific demographic groups to negative effects of restriction measures","Impact":"Increased disparities in access to physical activity and mental health support","Mitigation":"Tailored outreach programs, targeted support for vulnerable groups","Technologies":"Telemedicine, community engagement platforms","People":"Vulnerable demographic groups (e.g., men, young people, low-income individuals)","Owner":"Social support organizations, local community leaders"}]}
